named-query.name: SKU_OPTION_FIND_BY_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM SkuOptionImpl s WHERE s.optionKey = ?1

named-query.name: SKU_OPTION_VALUE_FIND_BY_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM SkuOptionValueImpl s WHERE s.optionValueKey = ?1

named-query.name: SKU_OPTION_FIND_UIDPK_BY_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM SkuOptionImpl s WHERE s.optionKey = ?1

named-query.name: SKU_OPTION_SELECT_ALL_EAGER
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM SkuOptionImpl s LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH s.optionValueMap

named-query.name: SKU_OPTION_IN_USE_PRODUCT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT so.uidPk FROM ProductTypeImpl p LEFT OUTER JOIN p.skuOptions so

named-query.name: SKU_OPTIONVALUE_IN_USE_PRODUCT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT pskuvalue.skuOptionValue.uidPk FROM JpaAdaptorOfSkuOptionValueImpl pskuvalue

named-query.name: SKU_OPTIONVALUE_FIND_UIDPK_BY_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT s.uidPk FROM SkuOptionValueImpl s WHERE s.optionValueKey = ?1

named-query.name: SKU_OPTIONVALUE_FIND_BY_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM SkuOptionValueImpl s WHERE s.optionValueKey = ?1

named-query.name: SKU_OPTION_SELECT_CATALOG_ALL_EAGER
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM SkuOptionImpl s WHERE s.catalog.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY s.optionKey

named-query.name: SKU_OPTION_IN_USE_PRODUCT_TYPE_SINGLE
named-query.query: SELECT so.uidPk FROM ProductTypeImpl p LEFT OUTER JOIN p.skuOptions so WHERE so.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: SKU_OPTIONVALUE_IN_USE_PRODUCT_TYPE_SINGLE
named-query.query: SELECT sov.skuOptionValue.uidPk FROM JpaAdaptorOfSkuOptionValueImpl sov WHERE sov.skuOptionValue.uidPk = ?1
